installCommand: (npm ci || npm install) && (python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip || python -m pip install --upgrade pip || pip3 install --upgrade pip || pip install --upgrade pip) && (python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt -t python_modules || python -m pip install -r requirements.txt -t python_modules || pip3 install -r requirements.txt -t python_modules || pip install -r requirements.txt -t python_modules)
